title: tudi sheivEn
sahitya:
tudi sheivEn murugA gati peravE padam unadai nAn


anupallavi

  padam unadE shatamena paTrinOrellAm gati peTru uivadai kaNDukoNDu nAn


caraNam    Adi antamillAda jyOti svarUpanE AdishESa shayana mAdhavan maruganE 
mAdar iruvar magizh mOhana maNALanE pEdaiyEn unnaruLaip-peTru uidiDavE
